name: Tuning Crystal
description: These crystal shards were mined from the rocks around Ulta Metamagicals. Tekki is using them to tune her upgraded asura gates.

name: Cursed Pirate Artifact
description: Priory explorers have been searching for these.

name: Crabmeat
description: Hunk of crabmeat only enjoyed by quaggan. Doolsileep could make something tasty with this.

name: Meat Hunk
description: A large hunk of meat. Chef Mestergruff of Mennerheim might want this.

name: Firefly Essence
description: The hylek have been known to concoct powerful explosives by processing remains of luminescent insects.

name: Slice of Grub Meat
description: Forager Sneckit in Skrittsburgh Hillstead collects this meat so it can feed skritt throughout Skrittsburgh.

name: Undamaged Power-Bauble
description: Twitchok in Skrittsburgh Tunnels is collecting these.

name: Red Summoning Stone
description: A red stone that's warm to the touch. Scholar Inka is using these for her experiments.

name: Blue Summoning Stone
description: A cracked blue stone that's cold to the touch. Scholar Inka is using these for her experiments.

name: Black Summoning Stone
description: A black, brimstone-scented stone. Scholar Inka is using these for her experiments.

name: Volcanic Rock
description: A shard of pitch black volcanic rock. It is extremely sharp. Sangdo Swiftwing is interested in these.

name: Scrap Metal
description: Oddly marked scrap metal taken from the steam creatures.

name: Explosive Powder
description: A special explosive that destroys steam creatures. Remember, don't use too much.

name: Frozen Fish
description: Guardian Infinite Mind in Groznev Delve is looking for these.

name: Moa Meat
description: Guardian Infinite Mind in Groznev Delve is looking for these.

name: Chunk of Dolyak Meat
description: Enduring Protector is looking for meat to feed his refugees.

name: Barracuda Meat
description: Hunk of barracuda meat enjoyed by kodan. Enduring Protector is looking to feed the refugees with this.

name: Skritt Artifact
description: A forgetten artifact the skritt left behind in the rush to escape the risen. Just what Crusader Aisling is looking for.

buff.description:
Trigger a flame blast with a 240 radius upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 7 Seconds)

Trigger a flame blast with a 240 radius upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Trigger a flame blast with a 240 radius upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

Gain a 30% increased chance to heal allies within a 180 radius around your target upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)

Gain a 40% increased chance to heal allies within a 240 radius around your target upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 7 Seconds)

Heal allies within a 360 radius of your target upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

Unleash a lightning strike upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 7 Seconds)

Unleash a lightning strike upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

Unleash a lightning strike upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 3 Seconds)
Chill a foe for 2 seconds after striking from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>
Chill a foe for 2 seconds after striking from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 15 Seconds)</c>
Chill a foe for 2 seconds after striking from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

30% Chance on Critical: Inflict Bleeding (3 Seconds)
(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)

45% Chance on Critical: Inflict Bleeding (4 Seconds)
(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)

Inflict bleeding for 6 seconds upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)

Gain quickness for 3 seconds upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)

Gain might for 10 seconds upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 1 Second)

Gain might for 7 seconds upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 1 Second)

Gain might for 5 seconds upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 1 Second)
Inflict vulnerability for 5 seconds after striking a foe from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)</c>
Inflict vulnerability for 8 seconds after striking a foe from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)</c>
Inflict 2 stacks of vulnerability for 8 seconds after striking a foe from behind or the flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)</c>

Steal health upon critically hitting a foe.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Steal a foe's health upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 7 Seconds)

Steal a foe's health upon landing a critical hit.
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

Remove a condition after striking a foe from its flank.
(Cooldown: 4 Seconds)

Remove a boon from a foe after striking from its flank.
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

Gain a charge of +2 power each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +7 power each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +10 power each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +2 condition damage each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +7 condition damage each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +10 condition damage each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +7 precision each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +10 precision each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +7 healing each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge of +10 healing each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)
Increase the duration of inflicted torment by 20%.

Gain a charge that grants a 0.5% increase in healing to other allies each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge that grants a 0.3% increase in healing to other allies each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

Gain a charge that grants a 0.4% increase in healing to other allies each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)
Gain Swiftness (10 Seconds) on Killing a Foe
Gain Swiftness (14 Seconds) on Killing a Foe
Gain Swiftness (20 Seconds) on Killing a Foe
50% chance to gain a random boon on killing an enemy.
75% chance to gain a random boon on killing an enemy.
Your endurance is refilled each time you kill a foe.
Gain health when interrupting a foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)</c>
Gain health when interrupting a foe. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)</c>

Damage nearby foes and chill them for 1 second when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Damage nearby foes and chill them for 1.5 seconds when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Damage nearby foes and chill them for 2 seconds when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)
Your next attack after swapping to this weapon while in combat steals a small amount of health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>
Your next attack after swapping to this weapon while in combat steals some health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>
Critically strike an enemy for 3 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>
Gain 5 stacks of might for 12 seconds when swapping to this weapon in combat. (Cooldown: 9 Seconds)
Gain 3 stacks of might for 12 seconds when swapping to this weapon in combat. (Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Inflict nearby foes with bleeding for 4 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Inflict nearby foes with bleeding for 6 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Inflict nearby foes with bleeding for 8 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)
Gain 25% of your endurance when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>
Gain 50% of your endurance when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

Your next attack will inflict 3 stacks of poison for 6 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

Your next attack will inflict 3 stacks of poison for 8 seconds after swapping to this weapon in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)
